page.title: 01 INTRODUCTION
page.content: Middleton Stoney is situated five km from Bicester and eighteen km from Oxford.The A43 runs through Middleton Stoney from Northampton to Oxford and the B4030 from Lower Heyford to Bicester. The small village in 1985 has a population of 256 people and 108 households.Within the next five years the population is estimated to decrease by one,although the households will increase by seven. Middleton Stoney has one small shop, a two star inn,a restaurant,a small industry dealing in agricultural machinery,one postbox,one telelphone box,one bus shelter,one play park and a manor house(not open to the public).The small Norman church was built in the second part of the twelfth century and is open for public viewing.
